RestaurantPartner.Name: Hungry Deli
RestaurantPartner.Description: Culver’s Restaurant was founded by the Culver family in 1984, which eventually branched out to more than 300 franchised restaurants all over the US. Culver’s is well-known for its ButterBurger, which made the restaurant extremely famous. They also have other items which include salads, sandwiches, desserts, etc.
